Detailed Description

Calls a lua function back.

Definition at line 38 of file lua_object.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

lubyk::LuaObject::LuaObject ( ) throw ()

Prepare tables to work with the table based self idion. expects stack to be: ... self if self (last argument) is a table, it is used as self. Otherwise, a new table is created. The method leaves "self" on top of the stack, with self.super = this.

virtual lubyk::LuaObject::~LuaObject ( ) [virtual]

Member Function Documentation

void lubyk::LuaObject::luaCleanup ( ) [protected]

void** lubyk::LuaObject::userdata_ [private]

This is used to invalidate the userdata in case the object is deleted out of Lua.
